summary: Reconstructed Representation.lean: removed constant-family infrastructure, generalized CanonicalWorldState, defined canonicalOmega, rewrote truth lemma with time-indexed fam.mcs t, fixed Box forward sorry, updated completeness theorems to use construct_saturated_bmcs_int. Truth lemma is now sorry-free. Two new sorries for Omega-mismatch in weak/strong completeness (requires Validity.lean coordination).

artifacts.summary: Reconstructed canonical model with time-varying states, canonicalOmega, and sorry-free truth lemma
Implementation summary documenting all changes, sorry analysis, and verification results

completion_data.completion_summary: Reconstructed Representation.lean with time-varying canonical model (fam.mcs t), canonicalOmega, and sorry-free truth lemma. Eliminated constant-family infrastructure and Box forward sorry. Two Omega-mismatch sorries in completeness theorems require follow-up Validity.lean changes.
